attributes.action: Take action against Immigration and non UK citizens coming to this country to claim benefits
attributes.additional_details: There are hard working British Citizens who need the help but are not getting it or do not match the criteria ie not paid enough tax/national contributions. It is taking money out of the state that could be used to help people who really need it. It is unacceptable that people are claiming who do not have citizenship or are coming to claim because its easier or to send the money home. Like the program on channel 5 pointed out in Gypsies on Benefits and proud.
